meanings.sent1: The mysterious light in the sky was uncaused.
meanings.sent2: The scientist could not explain the uncaused phenomenon.
meanings.sent3: The uncaused laughter of the children filled the room.
meanings.sent4: Her uncaused smile brightened up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The uncaused growth of the flowers amazed the gardener.

meanings.sent2: The uncaused disruptions affected the schedule.
meanings.sent3: His uncaused absence surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The uncaused chaos in the classroom left the teacher puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The uncaused excitement in the air hinted at something special.
